pr_title: Add new Xtext editor quickfixes on *.xtext files

timeline.bodyText: Do we also get the Convert terminal fragment to terminal rule quickfix for this case?
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: I have enhanced the code to show the above quick-fix.
replies.author: nbhusare

timeline.bodyText: Please reword to Create terminal fragment instead of Create terminal fragment rule
timeline.author: szarnekow

timeline.bodyText:
I know that it is extremely unlikely to have that in production, but could you please add a test with this rule declaration:
terminal fragment/*comment*/FRAG: 'a';
timeline.author: szarnekow

replies.bodyText: I had to adapt the code after introducing the test for the above rule declaration. Could you please verify the changes.
replies.author: nbhusare
